糖尿病在抗生素耐药性的出现和扩展中起关键作用抗生素是强大的快速作用药物，旨在消除细菌感染。然而，近年来，随着抗生素耐药性细菌的继续发展和扩散，它们的可靠性已减弱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/diabetes-plays-key-reme-in-the-the-emergence-and-expansion-of-------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/diabetes-plays-key-reole-in-the-the-emergence-and-expansion of-andbiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b532cba-e7cc-457b-8049-2b9cbd7aaa31d Wed, 12 Feb 2025 20:20:57 -0500 Diabetes plays key role in the emergence and expansion of antibiotic resistance
加工食品中的普通糖可以加油儿童肝病吗？研究人员发现，高果糖摄入量，尤其是加工食品，与肥胖儿童中与代谢功能障碍相关的脂肪性肝病（MASLD）有关，并可能误会含糖食品来源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/could-a-common-sugar-sugar-in-processed-foods-be-fueling-childhood-childhood-liver-liver-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/could-a-common-sugar-sugar-in-processed-foods-be-fueling-childhood-childhood-liver-liver-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ccbc7af-ae8d-4bb5-a7aa-d7956aefc833 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 20:18:00 -0500 Could a common sugar in processed foods be fueling childhood liver disease?
研究表明根据2025年2月12日发表的一项研究，在将心理治疗师与Chatgpt撰写的回答与Chatgpt撰写的反应进行比较时，后者通常被评为更高的评分。 State University and co-founder of Hatch Data and Mental Health, and colleagues https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/ChatGPT-outperforms-psychotherapists-in-therapy-response-ratings-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/ChatGPT-outperforms-psychotherapists-in-therapy-response-ratings-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccb9367a-787b-4b68-a3e2-5d587b8e3074 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 20:15:34 -0500 ChatGPT outperforms psychotherapists in therapy response ratings, study shows
Blockbuster drug for diabetes and obesity could also help reduce alcohol intake根据新的USC研究，巨大的药物塞米卢皮德蛋白酶（更名为糖尿病的Ozempic和Wegovy for肥胖症）也可以帮助人们减少其酒精摄入量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/Blockbuster-drug-for-diabetes-and-obesity-could-also-help-reduce-alcohol-intake.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/Blockbuster-drug-for-diabetes-and-obesity-could-also-help-reduce-alcohol-intake.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=523436cd-1f04-4f32-8a91-2242db64dc04 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 20:11:17 -0500 Blockbuster drug for diabetes and obesity could also help reduce alcohol intake
远程医疗显示农村地区药物使用障碍治疗的承诺认识到远程医疗是提供用于药物使用障碍（SUD）治疗的有效策略（SUD），这提出了在有限的运输情况下或时间限制妥协的定期使用始终如一地使用对面对面的药物使用治疗的期望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/telehealth-shows-promise-promise-for-substance-use-disorder-disorder-warteatment-reatement-in-rural-aareas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/telehealth-shows-promise-promise-for-substance-use-disorder-disorder-disorder-warteatment-in-rural-arural-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4ec50c3-76E5-4122-A07A-D4CD516F34F9 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 20:07:03 -0500 Telehealth shows promise for substance use disorder treatment in rural areas
特殊的基于锌的溶解材料可以改变骨折的骨骼的处理莫纳什（Monash）的研究可以通过开发一种特殊的基于锌的溶解材料来改变骨骼的处理方式，该材料可以替代通常用于将骨折的骨骼固定在一起的金属板和螺钉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/special-zinc-基于dissolial-material-could-transform-transform-wareatment-brokent-broken-bones.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/special-zinc-基于dissolial-material-could-transform-transform-wareatment-brokent-brokent-bones.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d65cc2fa-2df1-4af6-9262-d12826798453 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 19:59:22 -0500 Special zinc-based dissolvable material could transform treatment of broken bones
全球前列腺癌和睾丸癌升高，但死亡率正在下降新的研究描绘了1990年至2040年的男性癌症负担的全球负担，以表明衰老，生活方式和医疗保健的机会如何影响前列腺和睾丸癌成果的未来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/globally-prostate-and-testicular-cancer-rates-cancer-cancer-cancer-cline-climb-blut-mortathic-is-is-falling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/globally-prostate-and-testicular-cancer-rates-cancer-cancer-cancer-climb-bimb-ut-mortality-is-is-falling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=257A7B2D-42BD-46ED-89E2-89E2-83FF75BC2CE4 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 19:54:00 -0500 Globally prostate and testicular cancer rates climb, but mortality is falling

电活动驱动小细胞肺癌的侵略性弗朗西斯·克里克研究所（Francis Crick Institute）的研究人员发现，一些特别具有侵略性的肺癌细胞可以发展自己的电网，就像人体神经系统中所见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/electrical-activity-activity-drives-drives-drives-ggression-in-small-cell-cell-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/electrical-activity-activity-drives-drives-drives-ggression-in-small-cell-cell-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A4EC90E2-30DD-4F17-93A8-D6E1B2999572E Wed, 12 Feb 2025 19:49:06 -0500 Electrical activity drives aggression in small cell lung cancer
